param1.name: scenarioFile
param1.description: File that describes the configuration scenario setup and other irace settings.

param2.name: debugLevel
param2.description: A value of 0 silences all debug messages. Higher values provide more verbose debug messages.

param3.name: seed
param3.description: Seed of the random number generator (must be a positive integer, NA means use a random seed).

param4.name: execDir
param4.description: Directory where the programs will be run.

param5.name: logFile
param5.description: File to save tuning results as an R dataset, either absolute path or relative to execDir.

param7.name: elitistNewInstances
param7.description: Number of instances added to the execution list before previous instances in elitist irace.

param8.name: elitistLimit
param8.description: Limit for the elitist race, number statistical test without elimination peformed. Use 0 for no limit.

param9.name: targetRunner
param9.description: The script called for each configuration that launches the program to be tuned. See templates/.

param10.name: targetRunnerRetries
param10.description: Number of times to retry a call to target-runner if the call failed.

param11.name: targetRunnerData
param11.description: Number of times to retry a call to target-runner if the call failed.

param13.name: targetEvaluator
param13.description: Optional script that provides a numeric value for each configuration. See templates/target-evaluator.tmpl

param14.name: deterministic
param14.description: If the target algorithm is deterministic, configurations will be evaluated only once per instance.

param15.name: parallel
param15.description: Number of calls to targetRunner to execute in parallel. 0 or 1 mean disabled.

param16.name: loadBalancing
param16.description: Enable/disable load-balancing when executing experiments in parallel. Load-balancing makes better use of computing resources, but increases communication overhead. If this overhead is large, disabling load-balancing may be faster.

param17.name: mpi
param17.description: Enable/disable MPI. Use Rmpi to execute targetRunner in parallel (parameter parallel is the number of slaves).

param18.name: sgeCluster
param18.description: Enable/disable SGE cluster mode. Use qstat to wait for cluster jobs to finish (targetRunner must invoke qsub).

param19.name: maxExperiments
param19.description: The maximum number of runs (invocations of targetRunner) that will be performed. It determines the maximum budget of experiments for the tuning.

param20.name: maxTime
param20.description: Maximum total execution time for the executions of targetRunner (targetRunner must return two values: [cost] [time] ).

param21.name: budgetEstimation
param21.description: Fraction of the budget used to estimate the mean computation time of a configuration.

param22.name: testNbElites
param22.description: Number of elite configurations returned by irace that will be tested if test instances are provided.

param23.name: testIterationElites
param23.description: Enable/disable testing the elite configurations found at each iteration.

param24.name: testInstancesDir
param24.description: Directory where testing instances are located, either absolute or relative to current directory.

param25.name: testInstancesFile
param25.description: File containing a list of test instances and optionally additional parameters for them.

param26.name: sampleInstances
param26.description: Sample the instances or take them always in the same order.

param29.name: nbConfigurations
param29.description: The number of configurations that should be sampled and evaluated at each iteration.

param30.name: mu
param30.description: This value is used to determine the number of configurations to be sampled and evaluated at each iteration.

param31.name: minNbSurvival
param31.description: The minimum number of configurations that should survive to continue one iteration.

param32.name: softRestart
param32.description: Enable/disable the soft restart strategy that avoids premature convergence of the probabilistic model.

param33.name: softRestartThreshold
param33.description: Soft restart threshold value for numerical parameters. If NA, it computed as 10^-digits.

param34.name: parameterFile
param34.description: File that contains the description of the parameters to be tuned. See the template.

param35.name: digits
param35.description: Indicates the number of decimal places to be considered for the real parameters.

param36.name: forbiddenFile
param36.description: File containing a list of logical expressions that cannot be true for any evaluated configuration. If empty or NULL, do not use a file.

param37.name: configurationsFile
param37.description: File containing a list of initial configurations. If empty or NULL do not use a file.

param38.name: trainInstancesDir
param38.description: Directory where tuning instances are located; either absolute path or relative to current directory.

param39.name: trainInstancesFile
param39.description: File containing a list of instances and optionally additional parameters for them.

param40.name: testType
param40.description: Specifies the statistical test type: F-test (Friedman test), t-test (pairwise t-tests with no correction), t-test-bonferroni (t-test with Bonferroni's correction for multiple comparisons), t-test-holm (t-test with Holm's correction for multiple comparisons).

param41.name: firstTest
param41.description: Specifies how many instances are seen before the first elimination test. It must be a multiple of eachTest.

param42.name: eachTest
param42.description: Specifies how many instances are seen between elimination tests.

param43.name: confidence
param43.description: Confidence level for the elimination test.

param44.name: recoveryFile
param44.description: Previously saved log file to recover the execution of irace, either absolute path or relative to the current directory.  If empty or NULL, recovery is not performed.
